body: Well, here I checked 'tensorflow/core/kernels/lrn_op.cc' as a reference and kept the same style with that. Since LeakyRelu C++ Op would only support {half, float, double} type, thus convert alpha type from float to T should be reasonable.
body_html: Well, here I checked 'tensorflow/core/kernels/lrn_op.cc' as a reference and kept the same style with that. Since LeakyRelu C++ Op would only support {half, float, double} type, thus convert alpha type from float to T should be reasonable.
body_text: Well, here I checked 'tensorflow/core/kernels/lrn_op.cc' as a reference and kept the same style with that. Since LeakyRelu C++ Op would only support {half, float, double} type, thus convert alpha type from float to T should be reasonable.
